Title: Provides free SUNY and CUNY tuition, books, and fees to all New York state and New York city employees
Summary: Provides free SUNY and CUNY tuition, books, and fees to all current New York state and New York city employees who have been such employees for at least two years, and who continue such employment throughout their academic program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing free SUNY and CUNY tuition to all New York state and New York city employees
